synopsis:
Plot Summary:  Agate Fluorite is the new transfer student at the elite school, “Cluster E.A.”, in which the sons of many prestigious families from different countries gather to study together. Soon after, Agate’s unexpected antics and enthusiasm in life impress many of his schoolmates, including Beryl Jasper, an honor student who is bored with his current way of… more Agate Fluorite is the new transfer student at the elite school, “Cluster E.A.”, in which the sons of many prestigious families from different countries gather to study together.
Soon after, Agate’s unexpected antics and enthusiasm in life impress many of his schoolmates, including Beryl Jasper, an honor student who is bored with his current way of life. However, unknown to Agate, he was born with a secret power that can create miracles.
